In a video posted to Twitter, Grohl is seen deliv… [+1985 chars]

articles.title: Disney+ Star Wars: Andor (Official Trailer) - Nerdist
articles.description: Fan favorite Cassian Andor returns in an all new prequel adventure on Disney+! Here's a first look at Star Wars: Andor, coming soon!
